analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ICO1.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol#780-810):
	External calls:
	- maxWeiAmount = _getMaxWeiAmount() (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol#784-786)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _tokenSold (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol#796-799)

ICO1.recoverToken (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,balance) (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol)

Reentrancy in ICO1.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol#780-810):
	External calls:
	- maxWeiAmount = _getMaxWeiAmount() (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol#784-786)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _balances (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol#799)
	- _weiRaised (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol#795-796)

TimedCrowdsale.constructor (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol#490-499) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol#495-497)

TimedCrowdsale.isOpen (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol#511-516) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= _openingTime && block.timestamp <= _closingTime (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol#513-516)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol#524-533) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > _closingTime (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol#532-533)
Parameter '_tokenAddress' of ICO1.recoverToken (/unique_chucks/34/0x30e067173347fa6983ac93935943ca9d64cec109.sol) is not in mixedCase
